data.Name: Yves Tumor
data.Bio: Yves Tumor is the solo moniker of Sean Bowie, the enigmatic multi-instrumentalist and producer based in Turin, Italy. Evolved from a diverse and prolific creative history under an expansive plethora of covert aliases, plus strong ties with forward-thinkers such as Chino Amobi and Mykki Blanco, Yves Tumor emerges as Bowie's most personal and matured incarnation to date, with 2015's When Man Fails You being their first release under the Yves Tumor alias - a unique blend of ambient Read more on Last.fm
